Values ​​of solidarity, at the base of all the new rights for 130 years, of all the advances "# 130PSSPA

To cry out indignation is necessary. But the meaning of our mission is to move from feelings to acts # 130PSSPA
We must be a laboratory of ideas and an inexhaustible proposal machine. That's the meaning of #systemsite # 130PSSPA
